name: @tazco/backend
description: Headless Financial API - credit card management, scoring, and payment simulation

scripts.dev: USE_AWS=true USE_INMEMORY=false PORT=3000 bun run scripts/start-dev.ts aws
scripts.dev:in-memory: USE_INMEMORY=true USE_AWS=false PORT=3000 bun run scripts/start-dev.ts in-memory
scripts.dev:emulator: USE_AWS=false USE_INMEMORY=false PORT=3000 bun run scripts/start-dev.ts emulator
scripts.dev:cloud: USE_AWS=false USE_INMEMORY=false PORT=3000 bun run scripts/start-dev.ts cloud
scripts.dev:aws: USE_AWS=true USE_INMEMORY=false PORT=3000 bun run scripts/start-dev.ts aws
scripts.test:integration:firestore: FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:8080 GCLOUD_PROJECT=demo-tazco bun test tests/integration/backends/firestore tests/integration/firestore
scripts.test:integration:dynamodb: USE_AWS=true AWS_ENDPOINT_URL=http://localhost:4566 AWS_REGION=us-east-1 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=test AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=test bun test tests/integration/backends/dynamodb
scripts.test:integration:all: bun run test:integration:inmemory && bun run test:integration:firestore && bun run test:integration:dynamodb
scripts.test:aws: USE_AWS=true AWS_ENDPOINT_URL=http://localhost:4566 AWS_REGION=us-east-1 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=test AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=test bun test tests/contract tests/integration/backends/dynamodb
scripts.emulator:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
scripts.emulator:reset:aws: docker compose -f docker-compose.aws.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.aws.yml up -d

author: Tazco Platform Team
